de.ryanthara.ja.rycon.gui.notifier

Class NotificationPopupWidget

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ryanthara.ja.rycon.gui.notifier.NotificationPopupWidget

  • public class NotificationPopupWidget
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements a notification popup and it's functionality.

    The notification popup is shown on the bottom right corner of the screen, normally above the windows toolbar. This notification popup stays on top of RyCON, doesn't steal the focus or is visible in the task manager.

    In the free version of RyCON the notification popup stays always open.

    The implementation is inspired by an article on hexapixel.com

    Since:
    2
    Version:
    1
    Author:
    sebastian

      • notify

        public static void notify(java.lang.String title,
                          java.lang.String message,
                          NotificationType typeIdentifier,
                          int time)
        Shows a NotificationPopupWidget which can be set up by a couple of parameters.

        This popup is used for the non licensed version of RyCON.

        Parameters:
        title - title of the popup widget
        message - message string of the popup widget
        typeIdentifier - typeIdentifier which controls the icon of the widget
        time - time in ms how long the popup is shown

      • startTimer

        private static void startTimer(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Shell shell)
        Starts a timer to enable automatic fade out the popup after the time.
        Parameters:
        shell - shell object to fade out
